item.title: A Dealer’s View on Kia Vehicles
item.description: A dealership professional shares honest insights on Kia models, covering reliability, resale value, and buyer expectations. What’s your experience with the brand?

item.title: A Simple Way to Avoid Unnecessary Fees
item.description: A clear breakdown of how buyers can recognize and remove junk fees during the car-buying process without conflict. Have you seen these fees before?

item.title: Two Tips for Better Dealer Negotiations
item.description: A practical look at two simple strategies that help buyers stay confident and informed when negotiating with a car dealer. Which tip will you try first?

item.title: How Sales Tactics Influence Buyers
item.description: A clear look at common strategies car salespeople use to guide decisions, with tips to stay confident and informed. Have you seen these tactics before?

item.title: Can We Afford This Shocking Asphalt Bid?
item.description: The crew reviews a large asphalt job estimate and weighs materials, labor, and budget limits to see if the project is feasible. Is this bid within reach?

item.title: Answering a question like this sets you up to lose THOUSANDS on your next car deal
item.description: A breakdown of how answering certain dealership questions can weaken your negotiation position and raise your costs. Could avoiding this help you save money?

item.title: Why Cash Buyers Have an Advantage
item.description: A breakdown of why cash buyers often secure better deals and how others can use similar strategies to negotiate. Could this approach help you next time you shop?

item.title: Why Won't This Car Sell?
item.description: An honest review of a vehicle that continues to sit on the market, exploring pricing, condition, and buyer hesitation. What do you think is holding it back?

item.title: I Tried to Buy a Car From Facebook Marketplace!
item.description: A firsthand look at the challenges of purchasing a car through Facebook Marketplace, from communication issues to hidden concerns. Have you run into similar problems?

item.title: Auctioned Car Had $300,000 in the Trunk!
item.description: A surprising discovery inside an auctioned vehicle leads to questions about its past and ownership history. What would you do if you found something like this?

item.title: How a Trade-In Can Lose Value
item.description: A look at the dealership processes and conditions that can reduce a vehicle’s trade-in value, with tips on how to protect yours. Is your trade-in ready for evaluation?

item.title: Test Driver Makes Contact with a Corvette
item.description: A test drive takes an unexpected turn when a driver bumps into a Corvette, prompting a review of what happened and how the dealership responded. What could have prevented it?

item.title: A Customer Tried to Outplay the Dealership
item.description: A walk-through of an unusual situation where a customer attempted to secure a $120,000 advantage, and how the team handled it professionally. How would you react?

item.title: Understanding Certain Car Brand Tactics
item.description: An overview of sales strategies some car brands use to influence buyers, with tips on how to stay informed and confident. Have you encountered these approaches?

item.title: Four Add-Ons to Skip at Finance
item.description: A breakdown of common finance-office add-ons that buyers often don’t need, helping you avoid unnecessary costs. Which ones have you seen before?

item.title: Why Used Car Prices Keep Rising
item.description: A clear look at the market forces driving used car prices upward, from supply shortages to changing buyer demand. What does this mean for your next purchase?

item.title: What It Takes to Operate a Car Dealership
item.description: An honest overview of the challenges and realities behind running a dealership, highlighting daily demands and financial pressures.

item.title: Features Removed from the 2021 GM Tahoe
item.description: A look at which features were discontinued on the 2021 Tahoe and why those changes were made.

item.title: Five Common Car-Buying Mistakes
item.description: A helpful guide to avoid frequent buyer errors and make more informed decisions when purchasing a vehicle.

item.title: The Real Costs of Running a Dealership
item.description: A clear breakdown of the major expenses involved in operating a car dealership, from staffing to inventory and overhead.
